predictions.statement: Large language models will be integrated into standard mathematical research workflows by 2026
A major breakthrough in P vs NP will occur before 2030
Classical education methodologies will see a renaissance in online learning platforms by 2027
A new mathematical notation system optimized for digital environments will gain significant adoption by 2028
Poetry written with AI assistance will win a major literary prize before 2026
A proof of the Riemann Hypothesis will be published and verified by 2035
Personalized education based on cognitive science will become standard in at least 30% of schools by 2029
A new form of digital literature combining interactive elements and traditional narrative will emerge as a distinct genre by 2027
Quantum computing will solve a practically relevant problem that classical computers cannot by 2028
Virtual reality will be used in at least 25% of university mathematics courses by 2029
A major social media platform will collapse and lose over 80% of its user base by 2026
Handwritten mathematical notation will be accurately digitized by AI with over 99% accuracy by 2025
A new programming language specifically designed for mathematical computation will gain widespread adoption by 2027
Traditional universities will see a 30% decline in enrollment for computer science degrees by 2028
A mathematical proof will be found that is too complex for humans to verify without AI assistance by 2030
Blockchain technology will be integrated into academic publishing to verify research integrity by 2026
